form.name: name
passwordForgot.text: Forgot your password? No problem. Just let us know your email address and we will email you a password reset link that will allow you to choose a new one.
verifyEmail.text: Before continuing, could you verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you? If you didn't receive the email, we will gladly send you another.
verifyEmail.info: A new verification link has been sent to the email address you provided in your profile settings.

tasks.table.name: name
tasks.toggleStatus.confirmation: Do you want to change status of this task?
